biography: Ricke, a man of considerable experience in the world of golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While details about his home club remain somewhat of a mystery, his presence has nonetheless been felt at several tournaments over the years.

He has participated in the Hector Trophée on two occasions, displaying a strategic style of play that keeps spectators on the edge of their seats. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Ricke's dedication to golf is undeniable.
As of the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Ricke is considered to be retired from the event. Of course, in the dynamic world of golf, one can never entirely rule out a surprise return.
